text: Vua phan: “Su tinh cua cac ba nhu the nao khi cac ba đa tim cach quyen ru Yusuf?” Cac ba cung len tieng: “Allah mau nhiem! Chung thiep hoan toan khong biet mot đieu xau nao.” (Thay the) Ba vo cua vi đai than thua: “Su that đa ro rang, chinh tien thiep la nguoi đa tim cach du do cau ta. Va qua that, cau ta la mot nguoi chan that.”
